page.title: 04SHOPPING IN COLYTON
page.content: There are two small supermarkets in Colyton which supply all kinds of food and groceries as well as a butcher and a baker. Three shops sell clothes and another sells shoes. There is also a chemist's shop, a hairdresser, a tool shop and an electrical shop. Another shop supplies pet food and equipment. For the many tourists who visit Colyton there are 2 gift shops, a craft shop, 2 picture galleries and a basket shop. There are also some tea rooms and two restuarants, as well as the four pubs and the take-away food shop. The Tannery shop (see page 16) sells agricultural and garden supplies. There are also three builders, a working forge, a bank, a Post Office, an estate agent and a solicitor who is an agent for a Building Society.
